name: deletePermissionSchemeEntity
description:
Deletes a permission grant from a permission scheme. See [About permission schemes and grants](../api-group-permission-schemes/#about-permission-schemes-and-grants) for more details.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

schemeId.description: The ID of the permission scheme to delete the permission grant from.

permissionId.description: The ID of the permission grant to delete.
